EmailTemplate.name: Rescheduling/Demo Ghosted - Day 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Luxury Presence - Rescheduling Link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It looks like we missed each other today. Let's schedule another time to walk through your goals and how we can help.
You can use my meeting link to schedule a time that works for you, or reply to this email and let me know when would be best for you to meet.
I'm looking forward to showing you how we can tell your story with a personalized website.
PS in the meantime, take a look at a few of our agents that recently won Wall Street Journal & RealTrends awards:
Darlene Streit -- Wall Street Journal REAL Trends 2022 Best Design Category Granston Group -- Wall Street Journal REAL Trends 2022 Best Seller Category The Malibu Life -- Wall Street Journal REAL Trends 2022 Best Video Category
Thanks, {!User.FirstName}
